summary: This appears to be a draft FBI 302 form documenting an interview with corrections officers regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody. The document is part of the investigation into Epstein's death at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation regarding his death while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Interview of Corrections Officers
events.description: FBI agents interview corrections officers regarding the circumstances of Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

keyFacts: The document is a draft FBI 302 form related to the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The interview subject appears to be corrections officers from the facility where Epstein died.
The document was created on August 30, 2019, approximately three weeks after Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The document is part of the FBI's Violent Crimes Task Force investigation into Epstein's death.
The attachment suggests detailed interview notes with corrections officers regarding the circumstances of Epstein's death.
